page.title: 17Farming in the Louth Area
page.content: We gathered our information by visiting two farms. Louth Park Farms(owned by public companies) rent 3580 acres around Lincolnshire, but G & B Dobsons (a family firm)own 2500 acres on two neighbouring farms. Louth Park usually grow Winter Wheat, Winter Barley, Oil Seed Rape, Brussel Sprouts, Linseed, Beans, Vining Peas, Swedes & Lupins. G&B Dobsons grow Wheat, Barley, Kayle, Beans & Sugar Beet. Both spray with Herbicides, Fungicides Insecticides & weedkillers.Louth Park Farms use several sprayers for the land, But G & B Dobsons use one big one.Wheat is cut and dried then sold.The rape is cut, stored and then dried and then sold. Whereas Brussels are cut and then sold to Processing Factories.
